se.sensiblethings.disseminationslayer.communication.security.signature

Class SignatureOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.sensiblethings.disseminationslayer.communication.security.signature.SignatureOperations

  • public class SignatureOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    SignatureOperation.java This class implements two operations (Signing and verifying) about signature of the messages
    Author:
    Hao

      • sign

        public static byte[] sign(byte[] message,
          java.security.PrivateKey privateKey,
          java.lang.String algorithm)
                   throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                          java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Retrieve the signature of the given message with specified algorithm
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be signed
        privateKey - the private key used to sign the message
        algorithm - signature algorithm
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.InvalidKeyException

      • verify

        public static boolean verify(byte[] message,
             byte[] sigBytes,
             java.security.PublicKey publicKey,
             java.lang.String algorithm)
                      throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                             java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Verify the signature of the message
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be checked
        sigBytes - the signature of the message
        publicKey - the public key used to check the signature
        algorithm - the signature algorithm
        Returns:
        True if the signature if valid, false if not
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.InvalidKeyException

      • verify

        public static boolean verify(byte[] message,
             byte[] sigBytes,
             java.security.cert.Certificate cert,
             java.lang.String algorithm)
                      throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                             java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Verify the signature of the message
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be checked
        sigBytes - the signature of the message
        cert - the certificate containing the corresponding public key used for verifying
        algorithm - the signature algorithm
        Returns:
        True if the signature if valid, false if not
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
